wordageddon.service

Class GameIntegrationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • wordageddon.service.GameIntegrationService

  • public class GameIntegrationService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service for integrating game data with database operations. Provides high-level methods for managing users, game sessions, and answers.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • saveGameSession

        public int saveGameSession(int userId,
                           GameSession gameSession)
        Saves a completed game session to the database.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user ID (would need to be added to User model or resolved)
        gameSession - the completed game session
        Returns:
        the session ID if saved successfully, -1 otherwise

      • updateUser

        public boolean updateUser(java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String firstName,
                          java.lang.String lastName,
                          java.lang.String email,
                          boolean isAdmin)
        Updates user information.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        firstName - the new first name
        lastName - the new last name
        email - the new email
        isAdmin - whether the user is an admin
        Returns:
        true if update is successful, false otherwise

      • saveUserGameSession

        public int saveUserGameSession(int userId,
                               GameSession gameSession)
        Saves a completed game session for a specific user.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user ID
        gameSession - the completed game session
        Returns:
        the session ID if saved successfully, -1 otherwise

      • getUserGameSessions

        public java.util.List<GameSession> getUserGameSessions(int userId)
        Gets all game sessions for a specific user.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user ID
        Returns:
        list of game sessions, empty list if none found

      • getUserGameSessionSummaries

        public java.util.List<GameSessionSummary> getUserGameSessionSummaries(int userId)
        Gets game session summaries for a specific user. This method returns lightweight summary objects instead of full GameSession objects.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user ID
        Returns:
        list of game session summaries, empty list if none found

      • getGlobalLeaderboard

        public java.util.List<UserLeaderboardEntry> getGlobalLeaderboard()
        Gets the global leaderboard showing all users with their total points.
        Returns:
        list of user leaderboard entries ordered by total points
